metadata.title: Pakistan values Iranâ€™s role in Muslim Ummah: PM

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 27 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Monday said Pakistan valued Iran's role in the Muslim Ummah and looked forward to advancing mutual goals of peace, development and harmony. In a post on X, he said, "Honoured to call on His Eminence Ayatollah Sayyed Ali Khamenei, Supreme Leader of Iran. I sought his views especially with regards to the current challenges faced by Muslim Ummah. We also exchanged views on bilateral and regional issues of mutual interests. " "I thanked him for Iran's role as a mediator and for expression of its concern for Pakistan during the recent crisis in South Asia," he added.
